about_the_game:
GamePlay

Enjoy the story while completing the puzzles.
Connect lines according to the numbers on the squares until all spaces are completed.
After completing the puzzle, you will get a diary of the protagonist's experience.
Collect all diaries to experience the complete story.

Story Background

One day the government customized a special plan called the Seed Plan.
The government recruited some criminals who committed crimes to come to this seed prison, and you are one of these criminals.
As long as a certain number of women are successfully pregnant, they can be exempted from their crimes and receive a large sum of money, and can live their own lives after being released from prison.
What will happen there?

Characters

Maki:

One of the Inmate at Seed Prison, 21 years old.
With short blue hair, brown eyes, slim body.
Convicted for embezzlement due to her family's financial situation but is actually innocent.

Nanami:

She has been in Seed Prison for a long time as a female prisoner, and has become accustomed to having sex with all kinds of prisoners, and enjoys it.
Bold and stubborn, doesn't take kindly to being told what to do by others.

Saya:

She is your childhood friend, 20 years old. She is an aspiring idol who is struggling to make it in the industry due to her lack of popularity despite being very talented. She loves you unconditionally.

Features

  • An imaginary fantasy erotic story with heroines who have unique personalities.
  • 20 sexy erotic CGs of heroines.
  • Skip puzzles whenever you want. (Press Enter at puzzle).
  • CG appreciation mode. (Click the CG next to it after completing the puzzle)

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains a large amount of extremely sexual content.
It may not be appropriate for all audiences.
Please make your own judgment before playing the game whether you meet the requirements for playing such games.
The story is purely fictional.
All characters appearing in this game are adults over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or higher; SteamOS
  • Processor: 4GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or higher; SteamOS
  • Processor: 4GHz+
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
